content.question: public class SomeClass { private int num; public SomeClass(int n) { num = n; } public void increment(int more) { num = num + more; } public int getNum() { return num; } } The following code segment appears in another class. SomeClass one = new SomeClass(100); SomeClass two = new SomeClass(100); SomeClass three = one; one.increment(200); System.out.println(one.getNum() + " " + two.getNum() + " " + three.getNum()); What is printed as a result of executing the code segment?

skill.text: 3.B: Determine the result or output based on code that contains data abstractions.
